name: Website Content Summary
description: Generates a summary of the content from a specified website URL using stored data and AI LLM.

sqlTables.name: websites
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE websites (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, url TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, content TEXT, last_updated TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: Get website content by URL
sqlQueries.query: SELECT content FROM websites WHERE url = :url
